seo.title: Corniglia Boat Tours 2025 | Cinque Terre Sailing Trips
seo.description: Boat tours and sailing trips from Corniglia area. See all five villages from the sea, swim in hidden coves, sunset cruises.

body.title: See Cinque Terre from the Sea
body.subtitle: Boat tours depart from nearby Monterosso. See Corniglia's clifftop position from the water and all five villages in one trip.

features.title: Five Villages Tour
features.description: See all Cinque Terre villages from the sea. Departs Monterosso, 2-3 hours with swimming stops.

features.title: Sunset Cruises
features.description: Evening sailing with aperitivo. Watch the villages light up as the sun sets over the Mediterranean.

features.title: Swimming Stops
features.description: Anchor at hidden coves and grottos. Crystal-clear water accessible only by boat.

features.title: Photography Tours
features.description: Capture the villages from unique angles. Best views are from the water during golden hour.

features.title: Private Charters
features.description: Rent a boat with captain for your group. Customize itinerary and timing.

features.title: Kayak Tours
features.description: Paddle along the coast at your own pace. Guided kayak tours available from Monterosso.

body.title: Experience Cinque Terre from the Water
